website_summaries.verdict: A few extra features make this a great pick if all you need is a booster seat. It offers two modes of use, giving you some flexibility as your child grows.
pros: High back and shoulder strap placement for younger children
Removable back for when they get older
Simple and easy to install and remove
Narrow seat base fits better in small vehicles
Can be used for children who are 40 pounds and at least 40 inches tall
cons: When the seat back is raised to the highest position, there is little padding in the lower back

customer_reviews.title: Great for families with 2+ kids.
customer_reviews.text: This high back booster is lightweight, easily portable, comfortable, and narrow enough to put three in a row. The black and gray is classy and blends well with black or gray seats. It’s not annoying like a bright green Dino seat. We have multiple seats in black and the kids don’t fight over them. The material isn’t anything special. It doesn’t have an amazing safety rating. But it’s good and gets the jobs done.
customer_reviews.author: Bissy&Bram

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early, very easy to assemble. Exactly as described and should work perfect for my daughter! The colors are grey & black. I'll be ordering another for the husbands truck! Also, the cushion is very soft and much better then some others I've looked at in store!
customer_reviews.author: Aubsmom13

customer_reviews.title: Why can’t the backing go on??
customer_reviews.text: This is for my nephew, we’ve upgraded him to a booster because of his size!! This is so hard to assemble, I cannot get the backing to snap in, not even my fiancé can, we’ve tried for 2 weeks now so we can use it and we have been unsuccessful at it! The part that snaps the backing to the base is much bigger than the whole designed and it will NOT go in, it is pretty frustrating since I need it to go on so he can use it!!! I can’t see how anyone else got it in!!!??? I’m lost of words! I will be returning within a week if it doesn’t work cause my return window is nearing
customer_reviews.author: Ditsy girl

customer_reviews.title: Cup holders useless, Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Reviews all seemed great, but my daughter said it was the most uncomfortable and refused to sit in it (8 years old so she’s had her share of seats in the past). The cup holders are useless (just elastic straps) and her water bottle kept falling out. Returned. Had my 9 year old son try it out and he didn’t like it either. She found an evenflo she liked instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Sleek!
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous to have my almost 5 year old change from her previous car seat to this but her pediatrician gave me the green light and she was due for a new one so thought I would give this a try! She loves it because she says she feels like a big girl since she’s wearing a seatbelt like mommy and daddy! It was super easy to put together and it looks like it is comfortable to sit in with the padding. Plus the color looks nice in my new car as well!
customer_reviews.author: JFlo92

customer_reviews.title: very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Ive had to order so many car seats this yr for my granddaughter, this was a poor purchase. Its very poorly constructed. Just spend the extra money on the 5 point harness ones, they are made so much better. When my husband picked it up he asked "what dollar store did you get this pos from" yes, its that bad. For $20 or $30 more get one that wont disintegrate in an accident
customer_reviews.author: krisnic

customer_reviews.title: Kept falling over at turns
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat because of great reviews. I am puzzled how did it get so many good reviews. This car seat does not have anchor clips and no matter what I would do my daughter I would keep tilting along with the seat on every turn. I don't understand how can you make a seat without an opportunity of installation. Also my daughter was complaining about how uncomfortable the seat is. She fell asleep once in it and poor thing looked extremely uncomfortable!!! I returned it and bought another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: This was the 2nd seat (for 2nd kid) but I also just ordered two more for another car
customer_reviews.text: These are great, well made seats. In in a prior career, I was a certified child passenger restraint technician/police officer. In other words, if you've ever seen where you can have your child seat "properly" installed or needed help installing one in your community, I was that person. I mention simply because I have seen and worked with a lot of child seats. I have two of this exact seat for my wife's car and two for my car. Love them. Easy to maintain and use.
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, bought it for my 5 year old he seems comfortable and definitely a lot safer then just a booster with no back. Might buy another one in couple of months my 3 year old daughter fights over it but she’s only 30 lbs even though minimum weight is 30
customer_reviews.author: W.J Cabada

customer_reviews.title: Great simple booster seat
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few other seats before buying this one and really recommend it. The others had the arm rests so close to the bottom part of the seat that it made it harder for my kiddo to buckle himself in and put the belt through. With this one the arm rest is higher up and leaves a much larger gap and he had no problems at all first try! He also does not complain about uncomfortableness or anything like that and we have used it on a few long car rides now.
customer_reviews.author: Alleyymarie

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat
customer_reviews.text: So nice to have a narrower seat making 3 of these in my SUV in the middle row possible. There are cupholders but not a "cup" so that means you can't keep things in it like sunglasses but it's still a great seat. The kids say they are pretty comfortable as well. They were running a deal on these when I bought two for $25 each... If they have that deal again I'll be getting more for our other car and/or grandparents!
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the product you get!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great inexpensive booster seat! Has ample cushioning in the material and can be easily removed for washing. The seat belt loop allows for the seat belt to move easily (unlike some high back boosters). Nice to have two cup holders with easy access. I wish it had LATCH anchors to hold the base down so I don't have to belt it in when not in use. No complain though as this is great value for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: AutoxSTI

customer_reviews.title: I just don’t like it, even though I really wanted too
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this car seat so much because of the great reviews that it had but I just don’t! I have a Honda Odyssey and I feel like this seat does not sit one the seat good. It wants to lean more to the right or the left because it has such a large base! Also the cupholders are only a elastic band and every time I make a turn the cup falls over and out of it which ends up making a mess all over the car!
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for big big kids
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5 years old and in the 90th percentile for his height so he’s been comfortably sitting in a booster without a back for about a year now. However, when we were about to move across country I really felt like we needed some more secure seat protection for him than what I had for driving around town. I read many reviews and checked out so many car seat. This seat is literally perfect for a tall kid. He’s comfortable with the back and adjusts with plenty of room to grow surprisingly. We will be able to use this for at least another year before having to remove the back.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Seifert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Booster for our Tesla Model S
customer_reviews.text: We had my mom buy this for her car based on the reviews. We ended up getting one as well and love it! We have a Tesla Model S and it fits great in the back seat. We do have a seatbelt holder extender so my daughter can buckle in on her own; however the seat fits really nice. She loves the cupholders and arms on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Schaff

customer_reviews.title: 40 lb minimum, description is wrong
customer_reviews.text: Description says 30 lbs as a minimum which is the only reason I ordered this product and box and instructions says 40 lb minimum. Cup holders are elastic band that cause cups to pop out.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Burdick

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected from Evenflo
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is very flimsy. I can't imagine what would happen if there was a wreck and that was what was supposed to be keeping my grandson sayings. My daughter likes it because it is not as bulky as her last one and he has plenty of room but at times too much room. I can't imagine how this pass is safety standards.
customer_reviews.author: debi

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: So happy to finally outgrow the combination carseat. I was always annoyed about getting the seatbelts tangled and dealing with winter coats, etc. But using the regular vehicle seatbelts in combination with the booster is so much better. I previously used a backless booster in carpools for economical reasons, but decided that when we got rid of the carseat for good, I wanted a booster with a back and this Evenflo fit the bill and both my son and I are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: LawyerMom

customer_reviews.title: Seems great so far
customer_reviews.text: So far the toddler loves it. He is able to get in and out easily. I like that it seems to hold the seatbelt in the plastic slot and it seems like it will stay clean easily. Holds drinks and snacks well. Allows the toddler to buckle themselves in and get themselves out easier than the past ones. I still make sure he is in well but it sort of encourages independence. Fabric is nice and padding is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Anne Stevens

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This chair is not the most comfortable but my kid doesn’t care since his not in it for a very long time. So I wouldn’t recommend it for long trips. Is also not the safest chair but my kid is bigger and heavier than his age so I feel comfortable enough for the very little use I put it thru.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Good car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to use and move around, but secure when kid buckled in. Brilliant cup holders; they’re easy to use but also easy to clean. 4 year old can get in and out of it easily and is comfortable in it. Haven’t tried it with the back off yet. Got one for my car & for hubby’s car.
customer_reviews.author: BWS

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat
customer_reviews.text: Works great thus far for our 4 1/2 year old. I kind of wish there were a clip or something to keep the belt buckle within easy reach because that's the part that she struggles most with when trying to buckle herself in this seat. For the money though, I'm giving this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for my 40lb 3year old! He is mature enough to ride in it around town. A couple three hour trips he needed reminders to stay facing forward but overall was ok. Works best with the back IMO but well enough without it (checked it in luggage so we wanted the smaller footprint.)
customer_reviews.author: Anna McKee

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Website Description
customer_reviews.text: The website claims the minimum weight requirement is 30 lbs but the packaging says 40 lbs. My 4 year old is 32 pounds and unlikely to get to 40 anytime soon. I now have a completely useless car seat. But worse than that my child is beyond disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase for the money!
customer_reviews.text: These are simple basic car seats, I got 2. They are compact and don’t take up a lot of space. I’ve always had big bulky ones for my kids and I’m loving these! Super easy to clean and move around. Easy to move the backs up and down when the kiddos switch car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Feels a little flimsy when not in the car and supported by the seat, but we won't need the high back for much longer (maybe 6 months). I could not go straight for the backless booster because my daughter is a tiny 5 year old, not yet 40 lbs. I like how the cup holders do not stick out and so the base is super narrow. Overall I think it has been a good value for us and we have no complaints from our daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Omg yes!! The perfect booster!!
customer_reviews.text: Let's be real, carseats are a pain in the rear. But I love this booster because it's light enough that my son (age 5) can carry it himself, and put it in the car, and buckle himself in... hands free for this mama! Wooo! Yes, I make sure he's secure before we drive... calm down. Also, if you travel a lot, you want this booster! It's so light and easy to carry through the airport, and durable enough that after 8 airport trips for my son this year, it is still in great shape!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My big kid LOVES his seat. I didnt let him switch from his harness, but his father picked up a similar seat as a backup. He ended up being super good with it so we bought him this one for the main car. It works great (he is 7)
customer_reviews.author: K. Alford

customer_reviews.title: Static Black is not a Big Kid AMP, it is a Big Kid LX
customer_reviews.text: Please be aware that the Static Black version of this Evenflo Big Kid booster seat is not the Big Kid AMP, that received top ratings from Consumer Reports. It is the Big Kid LX that received a lower CR score. The page for this item combines a few different Evenflo Big Kid booster seats in the same group, even though they are different. After you choose the color and design you like, read the description provided by the manufacturer. That will say which type of Big Kid booster seat you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Easy for kids to use
customer_reviews.text: It looks a little cheap but it is far easier for my 5 year old to use than our other booster. I bought a Chicco highback booster and while it is comfortable, the belt routing is awful for the chicco. This evenflo booster is a lot easier, but still feels safe. Would buy again. Wish there was more seat padding.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: unsure :(
customer_reviews.text: hate to give bad review and its not really bad, im just not sure about this one. lightweight and grandson likes it, but he doesn't look very comfortable in it to me... but says he is...not sure that it offers much in the way of protection. I bought it just so my grandson would have a place to rest his head and also hoping for lil more protection in case of accidents... probably should have invested in something sturdier ...
customer_reviews.author: one eighty

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Easy to get in and out of vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Lisakay Mindel

customer_reviews.title: My daughter likes it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes it, but it's still wider than the seat bottom of my Chrysler 300. It sits a little slanted. Maybe I should plop down a foam pad first to fill the space. I ordered a belt buckle extension to help her buckle herself.
customer_reviews.author: iLikeWaffles

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfy and pretty cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for our son to replace his baby car seat. I'm going to keep it in our second car, because I don't like it at all. Doesn't have good head protection, the fabric is cheap quality. We have 2 boosters from Costco and they were cheaper but better quality
customer_reviews.author: TVH

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5 year old and we love it. His “convertible car seat” was a joke turned in to a high back booster and I didn’t want to spend a lot of money to replace it. This one is perfect. Doesn’t take a lot of room, light weight and comfortable for our son.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great High Back Booster
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a high back booster to have on hand for other people to use when driving our 6 year old somewhere, and this one is perfect. It's pretty compact so it doesn't take up a lot of space in the garage, it's light so it is easy to move between cars, and the cup holder makes the kids happy!
customer_reviews.author: ylime

customer_reviews.title: The technical description on the Web Site opens Amazon/Evenflo Up to Lawsuits
customer_reviews.text: Not used the product yet, but the technical description on Amazon says minimum weight 22 lbs. When the box arrived, it makes very clear that 40 lbs and 4 years old are the minimum age. This is nowhere on the Amazon description nor the technical description that I can see. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fit good for 3 in a row
customer_reviews.text: We needed a narrow booster for an outboard seat. The headwings on this aren’t as sturdy as some other options but it fit the bill for what we needed. Generally the kids have an easy time buckling and the 6 year olds who have been using it in my car seem to get a good fit on the lap and shoulder belt
customer_reviews.author: jamieg1234

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, compact but looks nice
customer_reviews.text: No instructions, someone had obviously returned it and it was thrown together in the box and scuffed up. Seems very flimsy but i realize its justba booster not a car seat. The price definitely reflects the quality. It looks nice and saves space in my car though.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Fits well in smaller cars!
customer_reviews.text: Smallest footprint I could find. Simple, effective and seems to do the trick. Kids love them. They def sell bigger more grand ones but that’s not what I was looking for. Priced very well.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Osmond

customer_reviews.title: Needs assembly
customer_reviews.text: Had to assemble it, was not expecting that. It is OK but a bit cheesy, I was expecting a more complete unit, better fitment and better material. It will work, but not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Allen

customer_reviews.title: Badly designed, unsafe!
customer_reviews.text: Does not anchor into normal babyseat anchors. Safety issues noted nationwide. Company did not respond to my concerns. Only using this for short trips on neighborhood streets; no city or freeway!
customer_reviews.author: HohMoh Erectis

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This has been our favorite car seat yet! It’s very easy to put together, is small and compact which has been great for the amount of space we have and our child is able to buckle herself up because there are no bulky cup holders in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great seat and great price!! Easy to install!!
customer_reviews.text: Our son had to move to a bigger car seat and love this one. Easy to install, easy directions, and he loves it. He’s comfortable in long car rides and no complaints on my end!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. My 6year old loves this seat. Says it’s comfortable and hasn’t complained about any part of it. I also like that once he outgrows the height requirement the back piece comes off and it turns into a backless booster.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney & Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat
customer_reviews.text: Love Evenflo products. This booster seat is great. Easy to clean and can wash the cover in the washing machine. it doesn’t effect material by being washed.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Effective, decent quality and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive seat. No bells and whistles but it’s perfect for a 5 year old who will ruin it easily. Very easy to set up, install and move from one vehicle to another.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SEAT
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A GREAT PRICE ON A GREAT SEAT! MY SON SITS IN IT COMFORTABLY AND HONESTLY IT HAS HELD UP BETTER AND FIT MORE COMFORTABLY THAN CARSEATS I HAVE HAD 8 TIMES THE PRICE. WELL DONE. VERY HAPPY MOM. I WILL BE ORDERING ANOTHER FOR A SECOND VEHICLE.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 3 across in the rear seat
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our almost 7 year old specifically because of how narrow it is. We will need 3 seats across in my very small Kia Soul, and this is about 15” across and works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Our kids love their booster seats! Easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Great booster seat. We have purchased two of these car seat thus far. We have had our daughters for about 3 years and it's been working great. Easy to use and easy to clean. We just bought this one for our son and he has loved it! In short great value for the price and I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Just trying to help 😁

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my boys
customer_reviews.text: I have two boys one is five and he is as tall as an eight-year-old and the other is two and he is the size of a five-year-old. Yes! they are extremely tall and this booster seat fits them well.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old is ready for his big boy seat. Overall good quality for the money spent. I bought 2 for 2 vehicles Honda Civic and Dodge Charger. Fits perfectly in the backseat. Easy directions, seems comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Tenisha Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall torso kids
customer_reviews.text: This works great if you have a taller torso kiddo. The arm rests are higher than the other high back boosters. We had trouble with him wanting to lean on the arm rests and not being in his belt properly with other boosters. This particular version of the seat has a bit nicer padding than our other versions.
customer_reviews.author: AKJ

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: The fabric doesn’t stay on, the plastic “hooks” that hold it are pretty crappy. The top falls a lot, the price was right and the reviews were good. I’m gonna buy another for in in-laws car.
customer_reviews.author: Hatchet

customer_reviews.title: Great value but needs additional anchoring!
customer_reviews.text: Great booster for a great price. My only complaint is I had to use the buckle from my previous car seat to properly anchor it in my Honda Accord. Without the extra strap it would fall side to side on a tilt while my child was in it even during light driving.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Whitcher

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This item was very flimsy. The back moved freely as did the heard rest. Wasn't impressed with the quality and worried about the safety of the product. Returned it and purchased another type.
customer_reviews.author: T.Cox

customer_reviews.title: My kid says it's uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: We installed these seats before taking a 1.5 hour drive to a birthday party & upon arrival one of my girls said her hiney hurt. So I don't believe these seats are padded enough.
customer_reviews.author: Aleisha Lynn Solorio

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: It seems really cheap because it is so light weight but we sure lived this seat on our vacation. Super easy to install and carry around.
customer_reviews.author: haleigh howard

customer_reviews.title: Would Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with this product. Some of my favorite features include the easy installation process, light-weight of the product making it effortless to transfer in-between vehicles, as well as the comfort & safety features this product possesses.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Hassell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat. Easy enough for grandparents to figure out and install! Nice cover, adjustable and kids find it comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Rench

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for money
customer_reviews.text: one thing I was not in love with is that it feels a little flimsy but I've had chairs similar priced at the same rate and they all feel that way so this chair is what it says it is... I wish these child seats would have some kind of anchor so when you didn't have the seat belt on the chair it would stay in place.... But like I said all chairs of this price and style have those same defects in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Nice pattern
customer_reviews.text: This booster is much more compact than my last step up car seat/ booster. Not as comfortable as I'd like. There's no padding behind the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Valle

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The seat cover doesn’t fit the seat properly. It bulges out in different directions and doesn’t secure well in the back. I should have spent the extra 10 bucks and bought another Graco.
customer_reviews.author: Renae O.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: My 6yo daughter loves this seat! She says it is comfortable, she likes that it can fit big and small cups and they don't spill. I love how easy it is to get in and out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had something to fasten it to the car other than just the seatbelt because every once and a while my child undoes his seat belt and when he goes to get out the seat falls out of the car. It doesn’t move when he is buckled though.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Good except one thing
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product except it is a little wide for my car. It sits over the seat belt making it hard for my kid to buckle themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Ali J

customer_reviews.title: very happy mom
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with this product. We have 3 of these in different designs. We feel that our son is safe, and they are cute! its a win win.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Ekmeian

customer_reviews.title: Easy, basic booster
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. Not too bulky, I have two in the back seat and there is still plenty of room for all three of my kiddos. Pad comes off easily for cleaning. Not cushiony at all though, so might not be ideal for long trips.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lauf

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this car booster seat!
customer_reviews.text: It’s very compact, yet specious. Also, it’s lightweight car seat and super easy to move around. All you have to do is drop it on the actual seat and put a seat belt on. My 5.5 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: J.R.customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay...for the price
customer_reviews.text: I liked the easy assembly and lightweight of the seat overall but it is flimsy and some of the hook points for the seat cover weren’t cut out right so the straps wouldn’t hold correctly or stay put.
customer_reviews.author: MAO

customer_reviews.title: We have three. Love this seat.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third booster we have bought in this style. It isn’t bully, the material is great quality, my son is comfortable in the seat... what more can you ask for! I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: caTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move around, but too straight back
customer_reviews.text: The seat is too up right, when kids fell asleep in the car, they can’t really lean backwards to have the head comfortably on the head rest, not ideally for road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Outsider

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on reviews for my grandson, who had outgrown his previous car seat. Well made. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Mills

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He’s graduated to a big boy car seat and thinks the cup holders in the sides are pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 6 year old!!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old can already use a buster however, he still falls asleep in the car and this car seat helps support his head. It also is supper light weight. I do recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: It works like a booster with just a seatbelt, but this one has the headrest for added support. Eventually I will remove the back but for now it helps the transition from a car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Dee S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great safety ratings, and my 5 yr old son says its comfortable. He is easily able to buckle and unbuckle by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Beyer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I got this seat for my 4yr old daughter. Super easy to assemble and handle. My daughter has no issues using it on her own. Of course I always check to reassure the belt is tight and secure. Make sure the height is at the rite level for your child. It adjusts up or down and it's super simple and easy. Inexpensive and super durable! Highly recommend this "big kid" seat!! I got black because kids can be so messy. But great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Medrano

customer_reviews.title: Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: My husband had not problem putting this together. Our son sits in it like a big boy. Plus it has space for him to stow away his drink.
customer_reviews.author: Tiara Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best toddler booster
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something with a full back for my almost 5 year old and this booster is it. He loves it. Its safe, comfortable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Victor A

customer_reviews.title: Light weight. Cup holder. Yay.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Light weight. Cup holder is a plus. My little one can do his own seatbelt.
customer_reviews.author: Leeleeinjax

customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, very lightweight. I like that it has two places my daughter can put her cups or snacks! The only thing I would improve would be to make the seat a bit more soft/comfortable. But great for the price!

product_meta.title: Big Kid LX High Back Booster, Static Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackOffering 2 modes of forward-facing use, the Evenflo Big Kid LX High-Back Booster is designed for older kids ready to use the vehicle's belt, and need an extra boost for safe seating in the vehicle. The included belt clip helps safely position the vehicle's belt at your child's shoulder. 6 height positions offer a better fit as they grow, and can be easily adjusted with one hand. Once they are ready, the back quickly removes for a no back booster. Dual, integrated cup holders keep snacks and drinks close, allowing the driver to stay focused on the road. The comfortable, padded seat is great for long journeys, and is removable and machine-washable for easy cleaning. A variety of cool colors and patterns allow your growing child to express their individuality. Great for families on-the-go, this booster is lightweight and easy to move from vehicle to vehicle. Tumble dry the seat pad 10 to 15 minutes on low heat. DO NOT lubricate or immerse in water any part of this child restraint, unless rinsing is permitted.
feature_bullets: 2 Modes of Use: Seat easily transitions from high back to no back booster safety for older kids: Giving them the extra boost they need for proper vehicle belt fit

6 Position Height Adjustment: Easily adjust the height with one hand, offering a better fit for your child as they grow, correct positioning: The included belt clip facilitates correct vehicle belt positioning around your child's shoulder
Dual, Integrated Cup Holders: 2 Cup holders are built into the seat, keeping drinks and snacks close and allowing the driver to stay focused on the road

Easy To Clean: Removable seat pad is wipe able and machine-washable, easy vehicle to vehicle: The lightweight booster is easy to move between vehicles, perfect for on-the-go families; Do not submerge the harness strap.

Cool Colors: Let your big kid express their individuality with a variety of fun colors and patterns. With backrest-44 to 57 inches and tops of the child’s ears are at or below the top of the booster seat headrest

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,158 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
